title: Wild Kind of Look to the Day
author: VD
content_html:
Karl Denninger shares his thoughts on the US presidential election. I am under the impression that he is endorsing Trump as the lesser of two evils.

I do not like Trump. If you’ve read any of my material you know this; in the 2016 timeframe and all the way through 2020 I wrote dozens of articles critical of his policies. Yes, it was Trump that put in place the HHS policies that paid your hospital to kill your Grandmother during the Pandemic — but Harris and Biden not only didn’t reverse those policies upon taking office they confirmed and strengthened them. Yes, Trump wildly spiked inflation with his “Covid checks” — but Harris and Biden threw gasoline on the inflationary fire at more than twice the size of the damage Trump did. Yes, Trump is responsible for “warp speed” but after telling us all that we shouldn’t take the shots during the 2020 campaign Harris and Biden mandated that which, during the campaign, they told us they believe would KILL us, and were only stopped from enforcement by the Supreme Court.

I am dismayed that these are the choices, but they in fact are the choices.

Trump was the best US President since Andrew Jackson. We can only hope that he will a) take office, b) significantly outperform his first term, and c) join the Sino-Russian alliance in their war against Clown World.

DISCUSS ON SG
